text: Vice President Mike Pence tweeted, and then deleted, a photo showing a large group of President Donald Trump's reelection campaign staff not wearing face masks or social distancing, two recommendations of the coronavirus task force that Pence leads. https://t.co/lpQcA0Qq9B
